greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of A291904.
comment: Number of compositions of n where the first part is 1 and the absolute difference between consecutive parts is 1.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
program: def b(n, i): return 1 if n==0 else sum([0 if j==i else b(n - j, j) for j in range(max(1, i - 1), min(i + 1, n) + 1)])
print(map(a, range(61))) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Sep 06 2017, after Maple program
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 05 2017
